name: Cube Dash (Lathryx)
description:
This isn't particularly the longest or most fun game ever, but it sure is a start to my game development adventure! I hope that with the skills I have learned from this here, that I will be able to take part in game jams, and create fun and exciting games for all to play! I am happy to join this community once and for all with the knowledge and practices that I have learned throughout my years. I will consider this my first milestone of many, and I would like to thank the following: 

  • Brackeys, for teaching me everything I could ever want about Unity. 
  • Unity, for its great documentation and partnership with GitHub to allow me access to a free version of Unity Pro. 
  • Canva, for allowing me to make logos and other page art extremely easily. 
  • The internet, for its amazing troubleshooting abilities. 
  • And, of course, Itch.io for allowing me a free marketplace to publish my creations from here on-forth!
